
{{alias}}( x )
    Evaluates the natural logarithm factorial of `x`.

    For `x >= 1`, the function returns `ln( x! ) = ln( Γ(x+1) )`, where `Γ` is
    the Gamma function. Otherwise, it returns zero.

    If provided `NaN`, the function returns `NaN`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: double
        Input value.

    Returns
    -------
    y: double
        Natural logarithm factorial of `x`.

    Examples
    --------
    > var v = {{alias}}( 3.0 )
    ~1.792
    > v = {{alias}}( 2.4 )
    ~1.092
    > v = {{alias}}( -1.0 )
    infinity
    > v = {{alias}}( -1.5 )
    ~1.266
    > v = {{alias}}( NaN )
    NaN

    See Also
    --------
